derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin innocent- 'not harming', from in- 'not' + nocere 'to hurt'

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 【歌曲】Innocent【歌手】Taylor Swift 【作曲者】Taylor Swift 【时长】5:02 【专辑】<Speak Now> 【地区】美国 【公司】 Big Machine 【发行时间】 2010-10-28 【语种】英语 【专辑类型】 CD 【音乐类型】 乡村/流行音乐 歌曲介绍 这首歌是Taylor Swift 的专辑<Speak Now>里面的一首歌曲。它是Taylor 写给Kanye West，对2009 VMAs 事故的回应。Taylor Swift 是第一个赢得VMAs (Video Music Award) 的乡村

entry.def: If someone is innocent, they did not commit a crime which they have been accused of.

example.ex: He was sure that the man was innocent of any crime...
example.tran: 他确信那个男人没有犯任何罪。

example.ex: The police knew from day one that I was innocent.
example.tran: 警方一开始就知道我是无辜的。

entry.tran: 天真的;幼稚的;不谙世故的
entry.def: If someone is innocent, they have no experience or knowledge of the more complex or unpleasant aspects of life.

example.ex: They seemed so young and innocent...
example.tran: 他们看起来如此少不更事。

example.ex: He's curiously innocent about what this means to other people.
example.tran: 关于这对其他人意味着什么,他一无所知，这一点颇不寻常。

entry.def: Innocent people are those who are not involved in a crime or conflict, but are injured or killed as a result of it.

example.ex: All those wounded were innocent victims...
example.tran: 所有伤者都是无辜的受害人。

example.ex: The war was killing innocent women and children.
example.tran: 战争夺走了许多无辜妇女和儿童的生命。

entry.tran: 没有恶意的;无冒犯之意的
entry.def: An innocent question, remark, or comment is not intended to offend or upset people, even if it does so.

example.ex: It was a perfectly innocent question.
example.tran: 那是个完全没有恶意的问题。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who lacks knowledge of evil

sentences.sentence: "the principle that one is innocent until proved guilty"

means.word_mean: 2. lacking intent or capacity to injure;

sentences.sentence: "his ingenuous explanation that he would not have burned the church if he had not thought the bishop was in it"

means.word_mean: 5. used of things; lacking sense or awareness;

They clearly saw the man who attacked them, yet they mistakenly identified an innocent person.

means.word_mean: 涉世不深的; 天真的, 单纯的

sentences.cn: 我那时非常年轻, 幼稚无知。
